name: Blob Quest
description:
This was a little project I made with a friend years ago. Now being somewhat restored, you can play the game yourself
Play as a Little blob creature as he sets out on a quest to save his friend from the hands of an evil robin. Journey through 4 worlds while facing many enemies and some bosses that will hinder your progress.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move around

Z to jump

Might as well put on your playlist or something because this game has no music and barely any sound effects. Have fun.
